segments.text: Good morning ! I am a new comer in our office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! Welcome to our office !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you ! My name is Grace Williams .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you too ! I am Peter Smith .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today is my first day at work !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , hope you will enjoy your first day ! Just ask me if you need any help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . It's very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1
